title: American Sociological Review - The Paradox of Persistence: Explaining the Black-White Gap in Bachelor’s Degree Completion
description: Christina Ciocca Eller discusses her recently published article with co-author Thomas DiPrete, entitled, "The Paradox of Persistence: Explaining the Black-White Gap in Bachelor's Degree Completion" in the December 2018 issue of American Sociological Review. Thank you for listening.
content:encoded: Christina Ciocca Eller discusses her recently published article with co-author Thomas DiPrete, entitled, "The Paradox of Persistence: Explaining the Black-White Gap in Bachelor's Degree Completion" in the December 2018 issue of American Sociological Review. Thank you for listening.
